h2_title: How to Find Jiao-Loong of Waves
content: After defeating the Supreme Celestial Inspector, you'll gain the Somersault Cloud ability. You'll start near the edge of the cliff, in the wide-open area of the Foothills. From the edge of the cliff, look straight down to see a pool of water. Go down and to the center of this water to fight our first optional boss, Jiao-Loong of Waves.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Jiao-Loong_of_Waves.md', within the main section titled 'Jiao-Loong of Waves', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find Jiao-Loong of Waves'.
The content is as follows:
After defeating the Supreme Celestial Inspector, you'll gain the Somersault Cloud ability. You'll start near the edge of the cliff, in the wide-open area of the Foothills. From the edge of the cliff, look straight down to see a pool of water. Go down and to the center of this water to fight our first optional boss, Jiao-Loong of Waves.
